snippet: Scottish tennis star Andy Murray reacted to Maria Sharapova's failed drug test by noting that he's careful to read everything that is relevant to him....
lead_paragraph: Scottish tennis star Andy Murray reacted to Maria Sharapova's failed drug test by noting that he's careful to read everything that is relevant to him.

headline.print_headline: Murray: Careful to Read Everything That Is Relevant to Him
